thread.section_title: Hotel Chaplain Rive Gauche - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Quite Good - Review
thread.title_full: Quite Good - Review of Hotel Chaplain Rive Gauche, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: sonomujo
title: Quite Good - Review
text:
The hotel has quite a good location a few minutes walk from Vavein metro station and Norte Dam du Champs. Our room was a little on the small side but comfortable. It might be a challenge for a couple with large suitcases. The bed was excellent. The bathroom modern and spacious. The internet was excellent. I recommend including breakfast in your booking as it was above average with fresh fruit.
The staff are very helpful.
